subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Both injured last season after being hit by line drives, pitchers Jeff Karstens and Darrell Rasner are now healthy and relishing the chance to secure a spot in the Yankee bullpen.
snippet: Both injured last season after being hit by line drives, pitchers Jeff Karstens and Darrell Rasner are now healthy and relishing the chance to secure a spot in the Yankee bullpen.
